column1: List all products in alphabetical order":SELECT ProductName FROM Products
What are all of our products?:SELECT ProductName from products ORDER BY ProductName
List product categories in alphabetical order:SELECT CategoryName FROM Categories ORDER BY CategoryName
Who are all our Suppliers?:SELECT CompanyName FROM Suppliers ORDER BY CompanyName
Tell me all of our shippers:SELECT CompanyName FROM Shippers ORDER BY CompanyName
Who are my employees by first and last name?:SELECT LastName || ', ' || FirstName AS FullName FROM Employees ORDER BY FullName
column2: :Concatenates two columns and sorts by last name by default

column1: List the last 10 order IDs ordered by date:SELECT OrderID from Orders ORDER BY OrderDate LIMIT 10
